snippet: Unlike the Jews in sitcoms like “Seinfeld,” the characters in the new Starz series “Magic City” are tough players, in Miami in the late ’50s.
abstract: Starz series Magic City, set in late 1950s Miami, portrays Jewish characters differently than most American television shows; executive producer Mitch Glazer pitched the program based on his experiences growing up in Miami Beach, surrounded by corrupt, swaggering Jewish mobsters.
lead_paragraph: Unlike the Jews in sitcoms like “Seinfeld,” the characters in the new Starz series “Magic City” are tough players, in Miami in the late ’50s.

headline.seo: ‘Magic City,’ Jewish Power Brokers in 1950s Miami Beach
headline.main: Old Miami Beach: Sun, Schmaltz, Murder
headline.print_headline: Old Miami Beach: Sun, Schmaltz, Murder
